text: Roberto Morinini (18 July 1951 – 16 March 2012) was a Swiss football striker and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:AC Bellinzona players Category:FC Locarno players Category:Association football forwards Category:Swiss football managers Category:AC Bellinzona managers Category:FC Locarno managers Category:FC Lugano managers Category:U.S. Avellino 1912 managers Category:FC Sion managers Category:Servette FC managers Category:Angers SCO managers Category:Yverdon Sport FC managers Category:FC Luzern managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Italy Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in Italy Category:Expatriate football managers in France Category:Swiss expatriate sportspeople in France
